song.title: Marvelous Light
song.lyrics:
[1] .B I once was fatherless .E A stranger with no hope .B Your kindness wakened me, .E Wakened me from my sleep || .B Your love it beckons deeply .E A call to come and die .B By grace now I will come .E Take this life, take Your life
[P] .G#m F# Sin has lost its power .E Death has lost its sting .G#m F# E From the grave You've risen victoriously
[C] .B Into marvelous light I'm running .E Out of darkness out of shame .G#m F# By the cross You are the truth . E You are the life You are the Way
---
[2] .B My dead heart now is beating .E My deepest stains now clean .B Your breath fills up my lungs .E Now I'm free, now I'm free
[B] .B Lift my hands and spin around .E See the light that I have found .G#m F# E Oh the marvelous light, the marvelous light
